pages.privacy-policy: Privacy policy - VirtuosoVoyage VirtuosoVoyage Home Service About Contact Privacy policy Collection of Personal Information: We may collect personal information such as name, email address, and phone number when you register for our music courses or sign up for our newsletter. Your personal information is collected solely for the purpose of providing you with our services and enhancing your experience with VirtuosoVoyage. We may also collect non-personal information such as IP address, browser type, and device information for analytics and optimization purposes. Your personal information is securely stored and protected against unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time by contacting us. Use of Personal Information: We may use your personal information to communicate with you about our services, promotions, and updates. Your personal information may also be used to process transactions, fulfill orders, and provide customer support. We may use non-personal information for analytics, research, and improving our website and services. Your personal information will not be shared, sold, or rented to third parties without your consent, except as required by law. We may anonymize or aggregate your personal information for statistical or research purposes. Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience and personalize content. Cookies are small files stored on your device that track your interactions with our website. You can choose to accept or decline cookies through your browser settings, although this may affect your ability to access certain features of our website. We may use third-party cookies for analytics, advertising, and social media integration. By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies and tracking technologies as described in this privacy policy. Third-Party Links: Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by VirtuosoVoyage. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of third-party websites, and we encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information. Third-party websites may have their own cookies and tracking technologies, which are governed by their respective privacy policies. Security Measures: We take reasonable precautions to protect your personal information from loss, theft, or unauthorized access. Our website is encrypted using SSL technology to ensure secure communication between your browser and our servers. Access to your personal information is restricted to authorized personnel who are required to maintain the confidentiality of your data. In the event of a data breach, we will notify you and take appropriate measures to mitigate any potential harm. Children's Privacy: Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child, please contact us immediately so that we can take appropriate action. Parents or legal guardians may review, update, or delete personal information associated with their child's account by contacting us. Changes to this Privacy Policy: We reserve the right to update or revise this privacy policy at any time, and any changes will be posted on this page. Your continued use of our website after the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised privacy policy. We encourage you to periodically review this privacy policy to stay informed about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Contact Us: If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints about our privacy practices, or if you would like to exercise your rights regarding your personal information, please contact us at VirtuosoVoyage@gmail.com. We are committed to addressing and resolving any privacy-related issues in a timely and transparent manner. Retention of Personal Information: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. You have the right to request the deletion of your personal information, and we will comply with such requests in accordance with applicable laws and regulations. We may retain non-personal information indefinitely for statistical, research, or archival purposes. Consent: By using our website or providing us with your personal information, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your information as described in this privacy policy. You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time by contacting us, although this may affect your ability to access certain features of our website or use our services. Your continued use of our website after changes to this privacy policy are posted constitutes your acceptance of those changes. Data Transfers: Your personal information may be transferred to and stored on servers located outside of your country or jurisdiction, including in countries that may not provide the same level of data protection as your own. We take measures to ensure that your personal information is adequately protected when transferred internationally, including by implementing appropriate safeguards such as standard contractual clauses. Marketing Communications: If you have opted in to receive marketing communications from us, we may send you promotional emails, newsletters, or other marketing materials about our products, services, or special offers. You can opt out of receiving marketing communications at any time by following the unsubscribe instructions included in the email or contacting us directly. Even if you opt out of marketing communications, we may still send you transactional or administrative emails related to your account or our services. Data Subject Rights: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, such as the right to access, correct, or delete your data, the right to restrict or object to processing, and the right to data portability. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the information provided in this privacy policy, and we will respond to your request in accordance with applicable laws and regulations. Accountability: We are committed to upholding the principles of privacy and data protection and to complying with applicable laws and regulations governing the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information. We have designated a privacy officer who is responsible for overseeing our privacy practices and ensuring compliance with this privacy policy and applicable laws. If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints about our privacy practices, please contact our privacy officer for assistance. Automated Decision Making: We do not engage in automated decision making or profiling based solely on automated processing that produces legal effects concerning you or similarly significantly affects you, unless such processing is necessary for entering into or performing a contract with you, is authorized by law, or is based on your explicit consent. Data Breach Notification: In the event of a data breach involving your personal information, we will notify you and the appropriate authorities as required by law. Our notification will include information about the nature of the breach, the types of information affected, and the steps we are taking to mitigate the breach and protect your data. Cross-Border Data Transfers: If we transfer your personal information to a third party or service provider located outside of your country or jurisdiction, we will take steps to ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and regulations. This may include implementing standard contractual clauses approved by the relevant authorities or obtaining your explicit consent for the transfer. Data Protection Officer: We have appointed a data protection officer (DPO) who is responsible for overseeing our compliance with data protection laws and regulations and for ensuring the protection of your personal information. If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints about our privacy practices or the processing of your personal information, you can contact our DPO using the contact information provided in this privacy policy. Changes to this Privacy Policy: We reserve the right to update or modify this privacy policy at any time, and any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. We encourage you to review this privacy policy periodically to stay informed about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Your continued use of our website or services after the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of those changes. Home Service About Contact Privacy policy Terms and conditions Â© 2024 VirtuosoVoyage. All rights reserved. Number: +91-632-8665241 VirtuosoVoyage@gmail.com Jodhpur, Rajasthan 342001, India
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and conditions - VirtuosoVoyage VirtuosoVoyage Home Service About Contact Terms and conditions Acceptance of Terms: These terms and conditions govern your use of the VirtuosoVoyage website and services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms and conditions, you may not use our website or services. Registration and Account: In order to access certain features of our website or services, you may be required to register for an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for any activity that occurs under your account. Use of Website and Services: You may use our website and services for lawful purposes only and in accordance with these terms and conditions. You agree not to use our website or services in any way that violates any applicable laws or regulations. You further agree not to engage in any conduct that could damage, disable, or impair the operation of our website or services. Intellectual Property: All content and materials available on our website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, audio clips, and software, are the property of VirtuosoVoyage or its licensors and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not modify, reproduce, distribute, or display any content or materials from our website without our prior written consent. User Content: You may have the opportunity to submit user-generated content to our website, such as comments, reviews, or testimonials. By submitting user-generated content, you grant VirtuosoVoyage a non-exclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable, and fully sublicensable right to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, create derivative works from, distribute, and display such content throughout the world in any media. Payment and Billing: If you purchase any products or services from VirtuosoVoyage, you agree to pay all fees and charges associated with your purchase. Payment may be processed through third-party payment processors, and you may be subject to their terms and conditions. Refunds and Cancellations: Refunds may be available for certain products or services in accordance with our refund policy. You may cancel your subscription or enrollment in our services at any time, subject to the terms of our cancellation policy. Limitation of Liability: In no event shall VirtuosoVoyage, its affiliates, or their respective officers, directors, employees, or agents be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in any way connected with your use of our website or services. Indemnification: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless VirtuosoVoyage, its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any and all claims, damages, liabilities, costs, and expenses arising out of or related to your use of our website or services. Governing Law: These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws. Any legal action or proceeding arising out of or related to these terms and conditions shall be brought exclusively in the courts. Severability: If any provision of these terms and conditions is found to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect. Waiver: The failure of VirtuosoVoyage to enforce any provision of these terms and conditions shall not constitute a waiver of such provision or any other provision. Amendments: VirtuosoVoyage reserves the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time, and any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. Your continued use of our website or services after the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of those changes. Entire Agreement: These terms and conditions constitute the entire agreement between you and VirtuosoVoyage regarding your use of our website and services and supersede all prior and contemporaneous agreements and understandings, whether written or oral. Contact Us: If you have any questions, concerns, or complaints about these terms and conditions, please contact us at VirtuosoVoyage@gmail.com. We are committed to addressing and resolving any issues in a timely and transparent manner. Termination: VirtuosoVoyage reserves the right to terminate or suspend your access to our website or services at any time, with or without cause, and without prior notice. Upon termination, your right to use our website and services will immediately cease, and you must cease all use of our website and services. Dispute Resolution: Any dispute, controversy, or claim arising out of or relating to these terms and conditions, or the breach, termination, or validity thereof, shall be settled by arbitration administered in accordance with its rules. The arbitration shall be conducted, and the language of the arbitration shall. The arbitral award shall be final and binding on the parties and may be entered as a judgment in any court of competent jurisdiction. Force Majeure: VirtuosoVoyage shall not be liable for any failure or delay in performing its obligations under these terms and conditions if such failure or delay is caused by circumstances beyond its reasonable control, including but not limited to acts of God, war, terrorism, strikes, labor disputes, natural disasters, or governmental restrictions. Assignment: You may not assign or transfer any of your rights or obligations under these terms and conditions without the prior written consent of VirtuosoVoyage. VirtuosoVoyage may freely assign or transfer any or all of its rights or obligations under these terms and conditions without restriction. Language: These terms and conditions are written language. pages.about: About - VirtuosoVoyage VirtuosoVoyage Home Service About Contact About Us About Us At VirtuosoVoyage, We Bring Over 10+ Years of Musical Education Expertise. Choosing the right music school is essential for nurturing your musical talent and honing your skills. At VirtuosoVoyage, we don't just teach music; we cultivate responsible musicianship, instilling a passion for excellence and creativity. With our experienced instructors, hands-on practice opportunities, and structured curriculum, we ensure that every student is equipped with the knowledge and skills needed to thrive in their musical journey. Core Value The Core Value That Drives Everything. At VirtuosoVoyage, our driving force is a relentless pursuit of musical mastery. We believe in fostering excellence, creativity, and passion in every aspect of musical education. From our expert instruction to our innovative curriculum, musical mastery is at the heart of everything we do. It inspires us to push boundaries, nurture talent, and empower students to unlock their full potential in music. Contact Us Excellence Unleashed Dive into a world where excellence in music is not just a goal but a way of life. Experience our dedication to nurturing talent, refining skills, and fostering a culture of musical excellence that empowers individuals to reach their highest musical potential. Creative Exploration Embark on a journey of creative discovery where imagination knows no bounds. Explore innovative approaches to music education that encourage experimentation, expression, and the fearless pursuit of musical innovation. Passion Ignited Feel the fire of passion for music ignite within you as you immerse yourself in our vibrant musical community. Join fellow enthusiasts in a shared pursuit of musical excellence, fueled by passion, dedication, and the unwavering belief in the transformative power of music. Choosing the perfect music school is a pivotal decision. At VirtuosoVoyage, our mission is to deliver a holistic musical education, nurturing individuals to become skilled, responsible, and ethical musicians. We prioritize imparting knowledge of music theory, performance techniques, and artistic expression while instilling a deep respect for musical traditions and promoting innovative approaches to music-making. Selecting the right driving school is a crucial step. The vision of a driving school is to be a leading institution in promoting road safety and responsible driving behaviors. It aspires to create a community of drivers who are proficient in operating vehicles and committed to ethical and sustainable driving practices. The driving school envisions a future where its graduates FAQ Frequently Asked Questions 1. What instruments do you offer lessons for? We offer lessons for a wide range of instruments, including piano, guitar, violin, drums, flute, saxophone, and more. 2. Do I need any prior experience to enroll? No prior experience is necessary! We welcome students of all skill levels, from beginners to advanced musicians. 3. How long are the lessons? Our lessons typically range from 30 minutes to one hour, depending on the student's preference and instructor availability. 4. Can I choose my own lesson schedule? Yes, you can! We offer flexible scheduling options to accommodate your busy lifestyle. 5. Are online lessons as effective as in-person lessons? Absolutely! Our online lessons are conducted by experienced instructors using advanced technology, ensuring a high-quality learning experience from the comfort of your home. 6. Do you provide instruments for lessons? While we recommend having your own instrument for practice, we can provide instruments for in-person lessons upon request. 7. What is your cancellation policy? We understand that life can be unpredictable. We offer a flexible cancellation policy with advance notice. 8. How can I track my progress? Your instructor will provide regular feedback and assessments to track your progress. Additionally, we offer performance opportunities and recitals for students to showcase their skills. Service Individual Lessons Personalized one-on-one sessions with experienced instructors tailored to your learning style and goals. Group Classes Engaging group sessions designed to foster collaboration, teamwork, and musical growth among peers. Masterclasses Intensive workshops led by renowned guest artists, offering valuable insights and advanced techniques. Music Theory Workshops Dive deep into the fundamentals of music theory, covering topics such as harmony, rhythm, and composition. Performance Coaching Fine-tune your stage presence and polish your performance skills under the guidance of seasoned professionals. Recording Studio Sessions Experience the thrill of recording in a professional studio environment, perfect for creating demos or albums. Packages Essential Musician Package Kickstart your musical journey with this comprehensive package, including weekly individual lessons, access to online resources, and performance opportunities. $199/ *PER COURSE Personalized one-on-one lessons tailored to your learning style. Unlimited access to our online library of tutorials, sheet music, and practice tracks. Opportunities to showcase your progress in student recitals and concerts. Regular feedback and progress assessments from experienced instructors. Flexible scheduling options to fit your busy lifestyle. Exclusive discounts on additional services and workshops. Get Enroll Now Advanced Performance Package Elevate your skills to the next level with this advanced package, featuring weekly masterclasses, performance coaching sessions, and studio recording opportunities. $299/ *PER COURSE Intensive workshops led by guest artists and industry professionals. Personalized coaching sessions to refine your stage presence and enhance your performance skills. Access to state-of-the-art recording studio for professional-quality demos or albums. Priority booking for performance opportunities at prestigious venues and events. Networking opportunities with fellow musicians and industry insiders. Dedicated support and guidance from our team of experienced mentors. Get Enroll Now Most Popular Music Theory Mastery Package Deepen your understanding of music theory and composition with this specialized package, offering weekly theory workshops, composition clinics, and access to online resources. $249/ *PER COURSE In-depth exploration of music theory concepts including harmony, rhythm, and form. Hands-on composition workshops to develop your own original pieces. Access to a vast library of educational materials including textbooks, articles, and multimedia resources. Individualized guidance and feedback from our team of theory experts. Opportunities to collaborate with other musicians and explore new musical genres. Progress tracking and goal-setting to ensure steady growth and development. Get Enroll Now Contact I accept the privacy policy Sumbit Home Service About Contact Privacy policy Terms and conditions Â© 2024 VirtuosoVoyage. All rights reserved.
